title: aaDamODi galadE
language:
Telugu



Pallavi 



ADamODi galadE rAmayya! mATa 

(lADamODi)



Anu
sahitya:
tODu nIDa nIve anucunu bhakti gUDi nI pAdamu baTTina

nAto mATa  

(lADamODi)



CaraNam



caduvulanni delisi shankarAntshuDai sadayu-dAsuga-

sambhavuDu mrokka

kadalu tammuni balka jEsitivi gAkanu tyAgarAjE pAti

mATa 

(lADamODi)
